name: Abhijit Enterprises
description: Trader of Mix Plant, Paver, Sprayer, Roa
overview:
Established in the year 2009, we, “Abhijit Enterprises”, are a prestigious business organizations engaged in trading a commendable assortment of Batch Mix Plant, Drum Mix Plant, Sensor Paver, Mechanical Paver, Vibratory Road Roller, Wet Mix Plant, Bitumen Sprayer, Imported Asphalt Paver, Kerb Paver & Broomer, to name a few.

Our Team: We are backed by a deft team of expert professionals, which helps us smooth running of business operations. Our procuring agents help us in sourcing superior-grade products from the coherent manufacturers in the industry.

Vendor Base: Leveraging on the dexterous procuring agents, we have been able to associate ourselves with some of the coherent manufacturers in the industry.

Client Satisfaction: Keeping into consideration that a satisfied customer is the best business strategy, we aim to attain the utmost contentment of the clients.

Why Us: We are one of the fastest growing organizations engaged in manufacturing high quality products. Further, we pay due importance to the development of the fruitful business relationships with the clients.

Our Products:

Sensor Paver Mechanical Paver Vibratory Road Roller Wet Mix Plant Bitumen Sprayer Imported Asphalt Paver
